description: Contains fields common to all messages and comments

id.description: The unique identifier of the message or comment

createdBy.description: The unique identifier of the sender of this message

fileHandleId.description: The S3 file handle storing the body of this message.  Either 'messageBody' or 'fileHandleId' may be used, not both.  Note: The file's mime type should be 'text/plain' or 'text/html'.  If no character encoding is specified, then UTF-8 is assumed.

messageBody.description: The body of this message.  Either 'messageBody' or 'fileHandleId' may be used, not both.

messageType.description: The type of message in the message body or referenced file.
